titlestmt.titleproper: Page (Albert L.) collection of University of California, Riverside photographs
Albert L. Page collection of University of California, Riverside photographs UA.392
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Bianca Lisek and Ena Hillery, Student Processing Assistants.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-12-09 22:30:11 UTC.

did.unittitle: Albert L. Page collection of University of California, Riverside photographs
did.abstract: This collection contains portrait and group photographs of faculty from the University of California, Riverside and Citrus Experiment Station collected by Albert L. Page, an emeritus professor of environmental science and alumnus from the University of California, Riverside.

dao.xlink:title: Albert L. Page collection of University of California, Riverside photographs

daodesc.p: Albert L. Page collection of University of California, Riverside photographs

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Copyright Unknown: Some materials in these collections may be protected by the U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.). In addition, the reproduction, and/or commercial use, of some materials may be restricted by gift or purchase agreements, donor restrictions, privacy and publicity rights, licensing agreement(s), and/or trademark rights. Distribution or reproduction of materials protected by copyright beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. To the extent other restrictions apply, permission for distribution or reproduction from the applicable rights holder is also required. Responsibility for obtaining permissions, and for any use rests exclusively with the user

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [identification of item], [date if possible]. Albert L. Page collection of University of California, Riverside photographs (UA 392). Special Collections & University Archives, University of California, Riverside.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was acquired as a gift in 2015.

processinfo.head: Processing History
processinfo.p: Processed by Ena Hillery and Bianca Lisek, Student Processing Assistants, 2015.

Processing of the Albert L. Page UCR Photograph Collection was completed by undergraduate students from the University of California, Riverside as part of the Special Collections & University Archives Backlog Processing Project started in 2015. This project was funded by the UCR Library and administered by Bergis Jules, University and Political Papers Archivist, and Eric Milenkiewicz, Manuscripts Curator.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Albert L. Page is an emeritus professor of environmental science and alumnus from the University of California, Riverside. His research and teaching focused on soil chemistry, ion-exchange equilibria, and biogeochemistry of trace elements. Page was also a noted member of the Soil Science Society of America (SSSA) and served as the society's president in 1996.

scopecontent.head: Collection Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains portrait and group photographs of faculty from the University of California, Riverside and Citrus Experiment Station. Photographs form the Biological Control, Entomology, Plant Pathology, Soil and Plant Nutrition, and Horticulture departments are included.

arrangement.head: Collection Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into two series as follows:

controlaccess.corpname: University of California, Riverside. Citrus Research Center and Agricultural Experiment Station

scopecontent.head: Series Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains portrait photographs of faculty from the University of California, Riverside and Citrus Experiment Station.

arrangement.head: Series Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged sequentially according to box and folder number.

did.unittitle: Portrait photographs of faculty from the Citrus Experiment Station at UCR
Portrait photographs of faculty from the Department of Biological Control at UCR
Portrait photographs of faculty from the Department of Entomology at UCR
Portrait photographs of faculty from the Department of Plant Pathology at UCR
Portrait photographs of faculty from the Department of Soil and Plant Nutrition (S&PN) at UCR
Portrait photographs of various faculty members from various departments at UCR

scopecontent.head: Series Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains group photographs of faculty from the University of California, Riverside and Citrus Experiment Station.

arrangement.head: Series Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged sequentially according to box and folder number.

did.unittitle: Group photographs of faculty from the Citrus Experiment Station at UCR
Group photographs of faculty from the Department of Horticulture at UCR
Group photographs of faculty from the Department of Soil and Plant Nutrition (S&PN) at UCR
